name: chat
description: A complete chat application built with TypeScript with Vue frontend

scripts.docker:dev: cross-env MYSQL_PORT=3309:3306 docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose-dev.yml -p chat_dev up --build -d
scripts.docker:production: cross-env COMPOSE_PROJECT_NAME=chat_prod docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.prod.yml up --build -d
scripts.watch:packages: concurrently "npm run watch -w typings" "npm run watch -w api"

author: Athlon1600
